3: Meanwhile, on the other end of the explosions...
...Well, time to look for a way out now.
—Structural damage to multiple supporting columns within the park—
—All personnel are kindly obliged to stay under secure cover, or they might be ineligible for insurance coverage due to injuries or deaths stemming from failure to follow safety procedures—
As of following the chain of explosions from before, even more explosions reverberate throughout the entire park, accompanied by sounds of structural collapse.
The explosions from those hyenas are causing the whole place to break down!
Direct access is blocked! The only way left is the hidden passage in the Ferris wheel area!
